reviews.review_msg: Maureen is a chaotic & disorganized prof. She forgot to show up to class once. She often contradicted herself, especially about assignments which made it hard to know what was expected. She didn't give any grades or feedback back during the semester & released them all at the end of the course with the final grade, so we didn't know how to improve

Dr. Hoskyn is a very caring professor. She really cares about supporting her students and scaffolding their learning. She organized our grad class around very useful peer reviewed sessions from which we learned a lot. Though it meant so much extra work for her, she gave us feedback on multiple stages of our essay writing. She is a wonderful prof.
